sourceMeaningMnemonic: You run into someone's <radical>forehead</radical> with your <radical>car</radical>. The big forehead you hit is Kim Jong Un's. You know that now you're going to have the whole North Korean <kanji>army</kanji> coming after you.
meaningInfo: Imagine yourself running away from the North Korean army. You have to get to the border, the entire army is coming after you for hitting their dear leader!
readingMnemonic: The <kanji>army</kanji> is after you. Each army soldier has a <reading>gun</reading> (<ja>ぐん</ja>) and they want to use these guns of theirs to shoot you dead! You killed their leader with a car and now they’re gonna get you back with a gun!
readingInfo: Picture yourself running away from them as they shout and shoot at you. Hear the bullets wizzing past your head as you run away as fast as you can.
